content: this colour sorter is the perfect thing for you to whip up in a day as a gift or baby shower present or for your own little one i made one for my daughter and it really helped with her colour recognition and fine motor skills plus she loves throwing the balls around i hope you enjoy this pattern its so fun and easy to make **terms** - us terminology **materials needed -** 3mm hook stylecraft special dk - rainbow brights stitch marker tapestry needle scissors toy stuffing my info website ***https //crochetriver com/*** 1 etsy *** https //www etsy com/uk/shop/crochetriver 2 *** pinterest *** https //pin it/k8k7nic 3 *** 1 https //crochetriver com/ 2 https //www etsy com/uk/shop/crochetriver 3 https //pin it/k8k7nic
